document.full_text: the space shuttle discovery capped a successful construction mission with a smooth landing in florida on wednesday, ending a 27-year flying career for nasa's most-traveled spaceship as the agency faces an uncertain future.
document.title: shuttle discovery lands after final voyage
lines_and_colors: the space shuttle discovery capped a successful construction mission with a smooth landing in florida on wednesday, ending a 27-year flying career for nasa's most-traveled spaceship as the agency faces an uncertain future.
